        Returns:
        a message

        FileNotFoundException - something happened to the file

      • load

            throws FileNotFoundException,
                   ScriptException

        Returns:
        a message

      • maximize

        Find an instance where the Clafer's value is maximal.
        Parameters:
        clafer - maximize this Clafer's value
        Returns:
        the maximal value and the optimal instance

      • minimize

        public Pair<Integer,InstanceModel> minimize(AstClafer clafer)
        Find an instance where the Clafer's value is minimal.
        Parameters:
        clafer - minimize this Clafer's value
        Returns:
        the minimal value and the optimal instance

      • minUnsat

        public Pair<Set<AstConstraint>,InstanceModel> minUnsat()
        Find the min Unsat and near-miss example. The min Unsat is empty if the model is satisfiable, in which case the near-miss example is a real instance of the model.
        Returns:
        the min Unsat and near-miss example
